name: AudioScholar
0:
”Alexa, open audio scholar”
”Alexa, ask audio scholar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audio scholar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
AudioScholar is a skill built for distributing education and information via audio, slide, or video podcast style programs and attaining feedback from your audience. This skill features a sampling of programs from client AudioScholar sites. For more information on AudioScholar or the companion higher education skill AudioEducate, go to https://audioeducate.com . 

Regarding medical related content: AudioEducate is a skill that often provides health-related information from our clients. However, such information is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis, and is provided by the sponsoring client for informational and educational purposes only. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. However, if you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
